title: Top Places to visit in Kanker, Chhattisgarh
content:
Kanker city, a municipality, is the headquarter of Kanker District of the Indian state of Chhattisgarh.
Geography

Top Places to visit in Jashpur (Jashpur Nagar), Chhattisgarh
content:
Jashpur Nagar is a town and a Nagar palika in Jashpur District in the Indian state of Chhattisgarh. It is the administrative headquarters of Jashpur district and was formerly the capital of Jashpur State.
Jashpur State, was one of the princely states of India during the period of the Brit

title: Top Places to visit in Janjgir-Champa (Naila Janjgir), Chhattisgarh

title: Top Places to visit in Gariaband, Chhattisgarh
Top Places to visit in Durg, Chhattisgarh
content:
Durg is a city in the Indian state of Chhattisgarh, east of the Shivnath River and is part of the Durg-Bhilai urban agglomeration. It is the headquarters of Durg District.

title: Top Places to visit in Dhamtari, Chhattisgarh
content:
Dhamtari is a municipal corporation [1] and district in the state of Chhattisgarh, India, which is part of the Mahasamund Lok Sabha constituency formed on 6 July 1998.[citation needed]. The district is home to 3.13 percent of Chhattisgarh's total population.

title: Top Places to visit in Dantewada, Chhattisgarh
Top Places to visit in Bijapur, Chhattisgarh
content: Bijapur is a town in Bijapur district, Chhattisgarh, India. It is the seat of the district and one of the 4 taluks in Bijapur district. title: Top Places to visit in Bemetara, Chhattisgarh
Top Places to visit in Bastar (Jagdalpur), Chhattisgarh
content: Bastar District is a district of the state of Chhattisgarh in central India. Jagdalpur is the district headquarters. The district has an area of 10755.79 km². title: Top Places to visit in Balrampur, Chhattisgarh
content:
Balrampur is the headquarters of Balrampur-Ramanujganj district of the Indian state of Chhattisgarh. It is the administrative headquarters 441 km North of the state headquarters Raipur.
